nodes.bodyText: Wouldn't it be better to set the imageFilterParams  checkUpgradeMatrix to false in case of CM instead of creating a different method where you can override it. It will be difficult to maintain later.

I agree that it may not be the best solution, but overriding the imageFilterParams for one call does not seems better. How about separating upgradePermissionProvider.permitCmAndStackUpgrade to 2 different methods? And in the cm method we do not care about the matrix.
